function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased risk of airborne virus transmission","Impact":"Higher likelihood of virus spread in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Increase outdoor air ratio, operate ventilation system before occupancy, and open windows for ventilation","Technologies":"HVAC systems with increased outdoor air ratio, ventilation systems, air cleaners","People":"Building occupants, especially in shared indoor spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Lack of agreement on the effectiveness of ventilation in reducing the risk of infection","Impact":"Inconsistent application of ventilation measures, leading to potential misunderstanding or misinterpretation","Mitigation":"Further research and consensus building on the effectiveness of ventilation in reducing infection risk","Technologies":"Research studies, scientific simulations, data analytics","People":"Health and safety authorities, ventilation system designers, building managers","Owner":"Health and safety authorities, research institutions"},{"Description":"Inconsistent recommendations for the operation of air-conditioning systems and air cleaners","Impact":"Confusion and potential misapplication of air-conditioning and air cleaning measures, leading to varied levels of protection against virus transmission","Mitigation":"Standardize guidelines for operation of air-conditioning systems and air cleaners based on scientific evidence and best practices","Technologies":"HVAC systems with specific air-flow configurations, air cleaners with effective virus filtration","People":"HVAC system operators, facility managers, building engineers","Owner":"Health and safety authorities, industry organizations"}]}
